subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is a famous fortsite in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कितने ज्ञान के अन्तर्राजन कौन से उच्चल संतुलन की ज्ञान क्या?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort in Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the famous Rajasthani dish?
explanation_en: Kachori is a famous Rajasthani dish.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the traditional dance form of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Ghoomar is a traditional dance form of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which palace was built by Maharaja Jai Singh?
question_hi: महाराज जैसिंग देन देन के बनेवाई केबनेवाई
explanation_en: Jai Singh II built the Jaipur Palace.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rana ruled over Rajasthan during the Mughal Era?
explanation_en: Rao Kalyan Singh, also known as Rao Kalyan Singh, ruled over Rajasthan during the Mughal period.
